identification.name: BIAS Calibration Software (BICAS)
identification.description: Calibration software which tries to derive electric field L2/L2S datasets from electric L1R LFR and TDS (LFM) datasets.

release.author: Erik P G Johansson, BIAS team
release.modification: Various updates and refactoring; Incomplete but ICD compliant support for TDS data sets & RODP pipeline, L2R-->L1R , updated ICD compliance(pre-release)

modes.name: LFR-SBM1-CWF-E
modes.purpose: Generate SBM1 CWF electric field L2S data (potential difference) from LFR L1R data

out_sci.name: LFR L2S CWF science electric selective burst mode 1 data
out_sci.description: RPW LFR L2S CWF science electric (potential difference) data in selective burst mode 1, time-tagged

modes.name: LFR-SBM2-CWF-E
modes.purpose: Generate SBM2 CWF electric field L2S data (potential difference) from LFR L1R data

out_sci.name: LFR L2S CWF science electric selective burst mode 2 data
out_sci.description: RPW LFR L2S CWF science electric (potential difference) data in selective burst mode 2, time-tagged

modes.name: LFR-SURV-CWF-E
modes.purpose: Generate SURV CWF electric field L2S data (potential difference) from LFR L1R data

out_sci.name: LFR L2S CWF science electric survey mode data
out_sci.description: RPW LFR L2S CWF science electric (potential difference) data in survey mode, time-tagged

modes.name: LFR-SURV-SWF-E
modes.purpose: Generate SURV SWF electric field L2S data (potential difference) from LFR L1R data

out_sci.name: LFR L2S SWF science electric survey mode data
out_sci.description: RPW LFR L2S SWF science electric (potential difference) data in survey mode, time-tagged

modes.name: TDS-LFM-CWF-E
modes.purpose: Generate CWF electric field L2S data (potential difference) from TDS LF mode L1R data

out_sci.name: LFR L2S CWF science electric LF mode data
out_sci.description: RPW LFR L2S CWF science electric (potential difference) data in LF mode, time-tagged

modes.name: TDS-LFM-RSWF-E
modes.purpose: Generate RSWF electric field L2S data (potential difference) from TDS LF mode L1R data

out_sci.name: LFR L2S RSWF science electric LF mode data
out_sci.description: RPW LFR L2S RSWF science electric (potential difference) data in LF mode, time-tagged
